articles.description: RANVIR SINGH, a Good Morning Britain host and Strictly Come Dancing semi finalist, has shared a rare picture of her son on Instagram this week, after he was inspired to cut off his long hair to look like his mum's dance partner Giovanni Pernice, amid romance …
articles.content:
Yesterday the presenter reflected on her time on Strictly Come Dancing following her exit from the show.

articles.title: Covid vaccine online calculator predicts when you will get the jab - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: The coronavirus vaccine is now being rolled out across the UK
articles.content:
A new online calculator has predicted the date you could get the Covid-19 vaccine in the UK.
 The omni calculator guesses your place in the queue after asking some questions about you, like your job… [+3062 chars]
